amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Hope VI public housing revitalization program by $4.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding for revitalization of severely distressed public housing (Hope VI).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fattah amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Fattah.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fattah amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
